winner.name: Alejandro
winner.keyStats: 3rd finals appearance (finally won!) • Survived 9 votes against
winner.legacy: Closest finale ever (7-6-1) • Strategy over pure social bonds

finalists.name: Zoey
finalists.note: Only 1 vote against all season (cancelled by idol)

finalists.name: Scott
finalists.note: Held idol for 9 consecutive tribals; played perfectly at Final 5

placements.notes: 7 votes to win • Won fire-making • Survived 9 votes against

placements.name: Zoey
placements.notes: 6 votes • Best social game • Only 1 vote against (cancelled by idol)

placements.name: Scott
placements.notes: 1 jury vote • Perfect idol play at Final 5 after holding idol 9 tribals

placements.name: Geoff
placements.notes: Returnee • Voted out twice • 29 votes against (most)

placements.name: Sierra
placements.notes: Edge returnee • Perfect idol play cancelled 10 votes

placements.name: Emma
placements.notes: Season 3 winner eliminated Episode 2; stayed on EoE

placements.name: Dakota
placements.notes: Eliminated 7-2 • Quit Edge of Extinction at return challenge

winner.name: Alejandro
winner.description: Strategic mastermind • Won despite heavy targeting • Narrowest victory in franchise history (7-6-1)

fanFavorite.name: Jo
fanFavorite.description: Chaos agent • Competitive spirit • Fan Favorite

bestStrategic.name: Alejandro
bestStrategic.description: Adapted through twists and alliance collapses; controlled key endgame votes

bestPhysical.name: Gwen
bestPhysical.description: Best challenge performer • 4 consecutive immunities (Eps 11–14) • Tied most total wins with Zoey (4)

fewestVotes.name: Zoey
fewestVotes.note: Only vote against was cancelled by idol

legacy.summary: All-Stars season with Edge of Extinction twist. Alejandro finally wins on his 3rd finals appearance, edging Zoey 7-6-1 in the closest finale ever, while Scott earns 1 vote after a franchise-record 9-tribal idol hold.
memorableMoments: Triple-idol tribal (Episode 5 Part 2) where all 9 votes were cancelled
Scott holding an idol for 9 consecutive tribals then playing it perfectly at Final 5
Zoey's idol save on Geoff cancelling 7 votes
Edge of Extinction: 12 players reached EoE and 2 return challenges
Geoff voted out twice (29 votes against)
